title: Tilly's, Inc. (TLYS) Shares March Higher, Can It Continue? - Nasdaq.com
text: As of late, it has definitely been a great time to be an investor in Tilly's, Inc. TLYS . The stock has moved higher by 26.5% in the past month, while it is also above its 20 Day SMA too. This combination of strong price performance and favorable technical, could suggest that the stock may be on the right path.

We certainly think that this might be the case, particularly if you consider TLYS's recen t earnings estimate revision activity. From this look, the company's future is quite favorable; as TLYS has earned itself a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), meaning that its recent run may continue for a bit longer, and that this isn't the top for the in-focus company.
